movies.title: Zero Woman: The Accused
movies.originalTitle: Zero Woman: Namae no nai onna
movies.plot: Rei, the deadly but reluctant assassin for the Zero Division of the Tokyo Police Department, befriends a young man after she sees him cruising a gay bar looking for johns. After he gets beaten up by a group of street thugs, she takes him in to live with her. When a series of vicious murders takes place, she begins to suspect that the killer may actually be her friend taking revenge on everyone who has abused him. Will she uphold her duty to the police, or protect her only friend?
movies.simplePlot: Rei, the deadly but reluctant assassin for the Zero Division of the Tokyo Police Department, befriends a young man after she sees him cruising a gay bar looking for johns. After he gets ...

biography.bio: Mai Tachihara is an actress, known for Zero Woman: The Accused (1997), Ringu (1995) and Kyôto sekushî yôkai satsujin annai (1997).
biography.name: Mai Tachihara

biography.bio: Yûjin Kitagawa was born on January 14, 1977 in Yokohama, Japan. He is known for his work on Ooru naito ronga 3: Sanji (1996), Zero Woman: The Accused (1997) and Innocent Love (2008). He has been married to Aya Takashima since 2011. They have one child.
biography.name: Yûjin Kitagawa

biography.bio: Daisuke Yamazaki is an actor, known for Zero Woman: The Accused (1997), Namonaki Doku (2013) and Keiji ichidai: Hiratsuka Hachibei no Shôwa jiken shi (2009).
biography.name: Daisuke Yamazaki

biography.bio: Ayana Inoue was born on April 30, 1967 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Gregory Horror Show (1999), Zero Woman: The Accused (1997) and Pachinko Graffiti (1992).
biography.name: Ayana Inoue

biography.bio: Eiji Daijiro is an actor, known for Zero Woman: The Accused (1997).
biography.name: Eiji Daijiro

biography.bio: Ryôhei Kunieda is an actor, known for Hitozuma ginkôin: Furin mikkai (1998), Zero Woman: The Accused (1997) and Yomigaeri (2002).
biography.name: Ryôhei Kunieda

biography.bio: Reiko Kojima is an actress, known for Zero Woman: The Accused (1997).
biography.name: Reiko Kojima

biography.bio: Maki Meguro was born on July 27, 1972 in Miyagi Prefecture, Japan. She is an actress, known for Elephant Love (2009), Animusu anima (2005) and Zero Woman: The Accused (1997).
biography.name: Maki Meguro

biography.bio: Hitomi Ohtani is an actress, known for Zero Woman: The Accused (1997).
biography.name: Hitomi Ohtani

biography.bio: Eisaku Shindô was born on November 28, 1958 in Wakayama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kindaichi Kôsuke shirîzu: Hakurô no shibijin (2004), Zero Woman: The Accused (1997) and Yokohama Ankokugai Kikyou (2008).
biography.name: Eisaku Shindô

biography.bio: Jessica Calvello was born on August 8, 1973 in Virginia, USA. She is known for her work on Dragon Half (1993), Dirty Pair OVA (1987) and Ruin Explorers (1995).
biography.name: Jessica Calvello

biography.bio: Dan Green was born on February 16, 1971 in San Rafael, California, USA as James Hadley Snyder. He is an actor and writer, known for Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters (2000), Pokémon (1997) and Yu-Gi-Oh! (2000). He was previously married to Michal Friedman.
biography.name: Dan Green

biography.bio: Paul Hertel is a producer and actor, known for Ask God Here: Occupy (2013), Columcille (2017) and Waterways (2017).
biography.name: Paul Hertel

biography.bio: Matt Jayson was born on December 27, 1980 in Great Neck, New York, USA as Matthew Jayson Cwern. He is an actor and producer, known for NCIS (2003), Pretty Little Liars (2010) and Scorpion (2014).
biography.name: Matt Jayson

biography.bio: Viktor Krüger (engl. Krueger) is a trained actor from Austria, former professional athlete (American Football and Pro-Wrestling) in USA and Japan, a professional bodyguard, and a former professional wrestler for the WCW in Atlanta, Georgia USA. After his high school graduation in his hometown Graz in Austria, he absolved the mandatory Austrian military service as well. Then he moved to the USA to play College and professional American Football, before being recruited by the back then biggest professional wrestling organization WCW in Atlanta, Georgia. To this date Viktor Krüger remains the only Austrian worker for this company a TBS subsidiary and for the whole United States as well. After fulfilling his 3-year contract, Viktor started working for the fight organization Battlarts in Tokio, Japan where he did 19 tours to participating in over 73 shootfights able to secure 2 championships amongst other numerous achievements. During one of his tours to the land of the rising sun he was movie casted for the first time as the Yakusa king bodyguard in the Japanese movie "Zero Woman" directed by Norihisa Yoshimura. Throughout his illustrious 20-year pro-wrestling career Viktor was progressively casted for the international TV and film industry. Today Viktor Krüger is a regular lead cast especially for German and Austrian productions as a trained professional actor: "I'm just a big fan of a well told story".
biography.name: Viktor Krüger
